privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our services.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly (name, email, payment details) and technical data collected automatically (IP address, browser type, etc.).
privacyPolicy.usageText: We use your data to operate and improve the service, process payments, communicate updates, and meet legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance the site, analyze usage, and show relevant content. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.rightsText: You may access, correct, delete, and restrict processing of your data and withdraw consent at any time.
privacyPolicy.securityText: We apply encryption and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access and misuse.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For questions or requests regarding your data, contact our Data Protection Officer.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.acceptanceText: By using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms and all applicable laws.
terms.useText: You agree to use the services lawfully and in accordance with these Terms. Do not misuse or interfere with normal site operation.
terms.paymentsText: All payments are processed securely. By submitting payment details, you authorize charges for selected services or subscriptions.
terms.ipText: All content, trademarks, and other IP on this site are owned by or licensed to us. Do not copy or distribute without prior written consent.
terms.terminationText: We may suspend or terminate access at any time if you violate these Terms or harm our operations or reputation.
terms.disclaimerText: The service is provided “as is,” without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.
terms.governingLawText: These Terms are governed by the laws of the applicable jurisdiction. Disputes will be resolved by its competent courts.
terms.contactText: If you have questions about these Terms, contact our legal department.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage them.
cookies.whatAreText: Cookies are small text files stored on your device. They help recognize your device and remember your preferences.
cookies.typesText: We use essential cookies for core functionality, analytics cookies to understand behavior, and marketing cookies to show relevant ads.
cookies.usageText: Cookies help improve performance, personalize the interface, and analyze traffic.
cookies.manageText: You can manage or delete cookies in your browser settings. Disabling some cookies may affect site functionality.
cookies.thirdPartyText: Some cookies are set by third-party services (analytics, ads). Review their privacy policies.
cookies.contactText: Contact our support team with any questions about cookies.

business.title: Business analytics

kpiTooltips.totalRevenue: All money earned during the selected dates from every source: subscriptions plus one-time sales.
kpiTooltips.subscriptionRevenue: Money from repeating plans people pay on schedule (for example, every month).
kpiTooltips.oneTimeRevenue: Money from single purchases that do not repeat, like a one-off item or add-on.
kpiTooltips.mrr: How much money you can expect to get every month from all active subscriptions if nothing changes.
kpiTooltips.arr: The same idea as MRR but stretched to a whole year (MRR multiplied by 12).
kpiTooltips.arpu: Average money brought by one active user, including both paying and free users.
kpiTooltips.arppu: Average money brought by one paying user only, ignoring users who never pay.
kpiTooltips.conversionToPaid: The percent of people who tried your product and paid at least once during the period.
kpiTooltips.churn: The percent of paying users who stopped paying or canceled their subscription.
kpiTooltips.averageSubscriptionLifetimeDays: How many days, on average, a subscription stays active before it ends or is canceled.
kpiTooltips.totalUsersAtEnd: The total number of users you had when the selected period ended (old users plus new ones).
kpiTooltips.newUsersInRange: People who joined or registered during the selected dates.
kpiTooltips.payingUsersInRange: Users who made at least one payment inside the selected window.
kpiTooltips.activeLikeSubscriptionsAtEnd: Subscriptions that are active or almost active (including trials and set-to-expire) at period end.
